duck: Advent Film Group, an American independent Christian film company
American Financial Group, a property & casualty insurance company based in Cincinnati, Ohio, United States
AFG Arena, a football stadion in St. Gallen, Switzerland (named after the sponsor, Arbonia-Forster-Gruppe)
Afghanistan (the country code of, in several standards including those of: ISO, NATO, GOST, UNDP, International vehicle registration codes, IOC, and ITU)
Allco Finance Group, a global financial services business headquartered in Sydney, Australia
Alliance Financial Group, a banking and financial company based in Malaysia

milestones: U.N. reports Afghan opium production is up again
UK and Aussie troops will not fight opium in Afghanistan
2005 Afghan opium harvest begins
Afghan women's rights official shot dead

wiki.text:
'AFG' may refer to:
* Al-Futtaim Group, a large conglomerate operating in the United Arab Emirates
* Afghanistan (the country code of, in several standards including those of:
  ISO, NATO, GOST, UNDP, International vehicle registration codes, IOC, and ITU)
* Allco Finance Group, a global financial services business headquartered in
  Sydney, Australia
* Al-Anon Family Groups, for families and friends of alcoholics
* American Financial Group, a property & casualty insurance company based in
  Cincinnati, Ohio, United States
* Arbitrary Function Generator, another name for arbitrary waveform generator,
  an electronic device used to generate electrical waveforms
* AFG Arena, a football stadion in St. Gallen, Switzerland (named after the
  sponsor, Arbonia-Forster-Gruppe)
* Anders Fogh Rasmussen, Danish politician
* Advent Film Group, an American independent Christian film company
* Alliance Financial Group, a banking and financial company based in Malaysia
wiki.title: AFG
